People throw away a lot of trash. In many countries, people do not have to pay for throwing away their trash. This is a problem because it means people throw away too much trash. To fix this problem, some places started charging people for throwing away their trash. 
For example, in a town in the United States, people had to buy stickers for their trash bags. Only trash bags with stickers were picked up. This made people throw away less trash, but not as much as people thought it would. People just put more trash in their bags instead of buying more stickers. 
Some people even started throwing their trash away in secret instead of paying for it. This is a problem because it makes the trash problem worse. 
The only good thing that happened was that more people started recycling. But this might not be because of the stickers. People were already recycling before the stickers were introduced. 
So, charging people for their trash might not be the best solution. It's important to think about other things that might help, like how much money people have and how educated they are. 
It's clear that making people pay for their trash is not a simple solution. We need to think carefully about how to make it work.

Work and life are not the same. Many people are not happy with their jobs. They feel like they are just doing it because they have to, not because they love it. But loving your job is not enough. You also need to think about what your job does to you as a person, your mind, and your relationships. 
Some jobs can make you a bore, unable to talk to people outside of your job. You might be so busy that you have no time to think or be creative. Even if you are good at your job, it's not worth it if you are unhappy.
I want to find a way to make work more fulfilling. I think it should be a way to live a good life, not just a way to make money. It should be a way to discover new things about yourself and meet new people. 
But it's not easy. Many people are unhappy with their jobs, even doctors, accountants, and architects. They feel stressed and unhappy. The way we work is changing, and we need to find a new way.
I have been studying different jobs to see how they affect people. I have also looked at how people have worked in different cultures and how they have been happy. I want to find a way to make work more enjoyable and fulfilling. 
For example, hotels could be more than just a place to sleep. They could be a place where people from different countries meet and learn from each other. Hotels could use the knowledge of their staff to provide more services. 
Work is a relationship. It's not just about doing a job, it's about being with other people and working together. We need to find a way to make work more enjoyable and fulfilling. We need to talk to each other and understand each other better.

'Broadcasting' comes from the idea of spreading seeds widely. It's a way to share information and pictures with many people. This idea is connected to the idea of growth and development. The first TV was like a big seed that spread to many homes. People thought it would be a good way to share information and entertainment with everyone.
The first TVs were like a special kind of radio. They showed moving pictures and people could watch them at home. Some people wanted to make TV a two-way communication tool, like a phone. But big companies and governments wanted to control TV and make it a one-way communication tool, like a newspaper.
TV was also like a show in a theater. People watched it in public places, not just at home. This was common in many countries. TV was popular because people wanted to have fun and be entertained at home. As people's living standards improved, they could buy TVs and watch their favorite shows.
TV was also a way for governments to reach many people with important information. It helped create a sense of community and unity among people. The way TV was organized was connected to the way society was changing. People were moving around more and living in different places. TV was a way to bring people together and share information.
The idea of broadcasting is changing now, and maybe we will use a different name in the future. But for a long time, TV was a way to share information and entertainment with many people, and it played an important role in modern society.

Advertisers try to make us feel bad if we don't have something. Try not to look at advertisements next time you're outside. They can trick us into buying things without us realizing it.
Caves are interesting natural places. People have studied them for a long time. They want to know more about them. It's hard to visit some caves, so not many experts can study them. People who like to explore caves also learn about them.
Weather We used to rely on our senses to know the weather. Now we have machines that help us know the weather quickly. Computers can do complicated math fast. But we still need people to understand the weather. They help us make good forecasts. People can see things that computers can't, so they are important.'

'Music and Theatre
I used to think that opera is mostly about theatre. But now I think music is more important. When I worked at an opera house, I learned that music is the main thing. It should be like that. I come from a world where words and actors are important. There is no one directing the action once the show starts, and the performers and audience mostly speak the same language.
At a music performance, some people may not know much about music. They might feel a bit embarrassed or amazed by the skill of the performers. Even a good musician has worked hard to get that good. Going to a music performance is like watching a sports game - we know athletes work hard, but we can't do what they do.
Theatre audiences are different. They don't always understand how actors do their job and are not always amazed by what they do. They might not be impressed when an actor does a long speech. 
I think music can learn from theatre about how to make the audience feel more involved. Music is already like a show, with passion, humor, and drama. But sometimes the way we present music can make it feel too formal or too different from the audience. 
There are people working to make music more accessible and fun for everyone. I think music could be even better if it was more like theatre. Sometimes, music could be performed in new and exciting places, like a church or a park. This could make the performers and audience feel more connected.'

Making movies is a difficult job. It's like taking a book and making it into a film. Sometimes, things have to be left out or changed. This can be frustrating, but it can also be helpful. 
When I worked on a script, I noticed that I could take out a lot of the talking and descriptions from the book and still get the same message across. This doesn't mean that the talking and descriptions in the book were not important. It's just that different things are needed for a book and a film. 
In a book, you need to tell the reader more about the characters. You need to remind them what the characters are like. In a film, you can show the characters and people can understand them better. 
Watching movies is a special experience. It's like going to a different world. You can forget about your problems and just enjoy the film. But when the lights come back on, you're back in the real world. 
Some people don't think movies are a real art. They just think they're entertainment. But many people love movies and work hard to make them. 
The film studios are a strange place. There are many small rooms and it's hard to find your way around. But the people who work there know what they're doing. They make movies that people love. 
Many people want to make movies. They read books about how to do it and take classes. Some people even make their own movies with a small camera. One person, Robert Rodriguez, made a film called El Mariachi for just $7,000. He became famous and made many more films. 
In the past, movie directors had to work for a long time before they made a famous film. They started by working on small projects. Now, with the help of technology, people can make movies quickly and easily.

I grew up in a city with many houses. They were all the same, with orange bricks or white walls. Sometimes, the smell of chemicals from a factory came and made the air smell bad. I don't remember much from when I was little, but I do remember looking out of a window and seeing the houses go on and on.
My mom was a small, strict woman. She was always angry and I didn't understand why. She was very particular about things, like making sure we didn't go into our neighbors' gardens or touch their flowers. She also liked to listen to the radio and make us sit quietly while she did. She had some friends, but they were all a bit strange. They would talk about boring things like the weather and how mean some people were.
As a child, I had to stay at home until I was five, and then I went to school. My mom would send me with other kids from the street to school. I remember the summer holidays, when I would see some interesting things outside of our neighborhood. There was an old man who told stories about his adventures on a ship, and a charity event where I got lemonade and tried to help a charity.
My mom didn't like politicians and thought they were only looking for money. She didn't like the idea of people sending money to the government. She didn't have much kindness in her heart, but she did take me to the museum on Sundays. We would walk around and look at paintings. She wasn't very interested, but she liked it when it was free. Once, she saw a picture of a Roman soldier and said, "I wouldn't want to meet him at night!" That was the only time I saw her try to be funny.

I walked down Philadelphia Avenue on one side of the street. The sun was setting and it was getting dark. I knew this street from when I was a child. There were many houses with different styles and colors. Some houses had big porches and others had small ones. Some houses used to be stores, but now they are homes again.
I visited a friend who lives in a special kind of house called a loft. It used to be a curtain warehouse, but now it's his home and office. He wanted to make it feel cozy, so he put up a big piece of plastic to separate the living and working areas.
I also read about a writer named Bruce Chatwin. He wrote a book called "In Patagonia" that is very famous. He liked to travel and write about his adventures. But sometimes he made things up to make the stories more interesting.
I also liked to swim in the pool behind my house. One day, I had a great idea to swim all the way to the sea. I wanted to follow the rain and see where it goes. Swimming is a special way to explore the world and feel free.

Charles Darwin thought that people cry for no reason. But scientists now think that crying is important for people to connect with each other. When we are babies, we cry to get help from our mothers. This helps us feel safe and loved. As we grow up, we still cry, but it's not just to get help. We cry to show others that we care about them. For example, we might cry when we see someone who is sad or hurt. We might also cry when we hear beautiful music or a moving speech. Even when we watch a sad movie, we are more likely to cry when we are with someone else. This shows that crying is an important way for us to connect with others and feel part of a group.

The Earth is getting warmer. This is called global warming. We don't know exactly how much warmer it will get or what will happen. But we know that a warmer climate will change the weather everywhere. This will affect plants, animals, water, and soil.
Humans use natural resources like air, water, and soil to live. We need these resources to grow food, build cities, and support our families. If these resources change, it will be a big problem.
We know that humans have made the air warmer by releasing bad gases. This is making the Earth warmer. Scientists are trying to understand how much warmer it will get and what will happen.
They use computers to predict what will happen. These computers are like big machines that use math and science to guess what will happen. But they are not perfect and can make mistakes.
Scientists think that the Earth will get warmer and this will cause problems. Some places might get more rain, while others might get less. This could cause floods, droughts, and heatwaves.
The warmer Earth will also cause problems for plants and animals. Some plants might grow better, but others might die. Some animals might move to new places to find food and shelter.
The sea level will also rise. This means that some cities and islands might get flooded. Many people will have to move to new places and might lose their homes.
This is a big problem and we need to think about what we can do to stop it from getting worse.

Art is hard to understand because we often think about it as a special thing that exists on its own, like a painting or a building. But art is actually something that happens in our lives, in our experiences. When we separate art from our everyday lives, it becomes hard to understand. 
Art is like a mountain peak. It's not just floating in the air, but it's connected to the earth. People who study the earth, like geographers and geologists, know that. They want to show how the earth is connected to the mountains. 
The same is true for art. To understand art, we need to think about how it connects to our everyday lives. We need to look at the things we do and see, and the things we experience. This is hard because we often think of art as something special and separate. 
But art is not just something special. It's a part of our lives. We can enjoy art in many things, like movies, music, and comic strips. These things are not just art, but they can be enjoyable because of their aesthetic quality. 
Many people think that art is only for special things, like museums and galleries. But art is everywhere. It's in our daily lives, in the things we do and see. When we connect art to our everyday lives, we can understand it better.

Many years ago, the 1990s were a tough time for people who work in advertising. There was a big economic problem, and many companies were not making money. This meant that people in advertising had to work harder and be more creative to make their ads successful. They had to make sure their ads were good and effective, but they didn't have a lot of money to spend.
In the past, advertising was not as important as it is now. Companies didn't think about what their customers wanted, they just made what they wanted to make. But now, companies know that they need to make things that customers want. This is good for advertising people because it means they have more work to do.
However, this is also hard for them because they have to make good ads with less money. They have to be very creative and work hard to make sure their ads are good. Some people think that advertising is not very important, but it is important for companies to make money.
Now, people in advertising are under a lot of pressure to make good ads. They have to work hard and be creative to make sure their ads are successful. They have to make sure they are making the right ads for the right people. This is not easy, but it is important for companies to make money.

As people's lives got more complicated, they needed more clothes and ways to make them. This made the meanings of clothes and accessories more important.

Music - The Future
Music is a big part of our lives. We can listen to music on the radio, TV, CDs, and the internet. We can also play music ourselves. But, some people are worried that music is changing. They think that we will not need to learn to play instruments as much.
Many people like music. It makes us happy. We use music for many things, like celebrations and parties. Music is also good for our brains. Playing an instrument can help us learn and focus.
Some people think that music will change in the future. They think that we will listen to different kinds of music and use technology to make music. This will make it easier for people to make music, but it might also make it harder for some musicians to find work.
To prepare for the future, music teachers will need to change the way they teach. They will need to teach people of all ages how to play different instruments. They will also need to be good at communicating with people and working with groups.
It is important for people who work with music to work together to make sure that music is valued and appreciated. We need to make sure that people know how important music is in our lives.

Many people do not like actors. Sometimes, actors talk about their work in interviews. They should not talk so much. Instead, they should just do their job. An actor named Pavlova said, "If I could tell you, I wouldn't dance it." This means that sometimes it's better to show, not tell.
A famous actor named Paul Scofield said, "An actor's work has life and interest only in its execution. It withers away in discussion." This means that talking about acting is not as important as doing it.
There is a new actor named Adrian Lester who played Hamlet. He was very good. He was able to go from being a young boy to a grown man on stage. He was also very funny and serious at the same time.
Acting is when someone pretends to be someone else. But what makes them do it? What makes them move their body? These are big questions.
One director has a special way of working with actors. He calls it "dropping in". He shows the actors the script and they think about what it means. Then, they find the reason to speak and say the lines.
A good theatre should make you feel like you are part of it. The people working there should feel it too. The theatre should be comfortable and make you feel connected to the actors.
Not all theatres are good. Some are too big and make you feel small. A good theatre should be like a church, with worn stone steps. You should feel like you are in a special place.
When you go to the theatre, you don't know what you will like. The people who make the plays can't guess what you will want to see. They should make something new and special, or you might as well stay home.

Some people share their personal life on the internet. They write about where they are, what they do, and what they think. But this can be dangerous. When you share your life online, you are also sharing it with people you don't know. You might not want to meet some of them.
Many people are sharing their lives online. They think it will make them famous or rich. But sometimes it can cause problems. Some people have lost their jobs or friends because of what they wrote online.
There were some people who started sharing their lives online a long time ago. They were the first bloggers. They wrote about their daily lives, their thoughts, and their feelings. They shared photos and stories.
One blogger, Justin Hall, started writing about his life in 1994. He wrote about everything, even his personal life. He thought it was important to be honest and open. But sometimes this caused problems. He had to take down his blog because people were saying mean things about him.
Another blogger, Heather Armstrong, wrote about her job and her life. But someone sent her blog to her boss and she lost her job. She learned that what you write online can affect your real life.
Heather Armstrong learned a valuable lesson. She realized that even though the internet is a big place, it's still connected to our real lives. We should think carefully before sharing our personal thoughts and feelings online.

Many people don't get enough sleep. This is a big problem in rich countries. Research shows that 40 million Americans don't sleep well. Some books and movies are even about people who can't sleep.
Sleep is important for our bodies and minds. We need to sleep to feel rested and focused. A sleep researcher did an experiment where he let people sleep for up to 14 hours a night. They started to feel rested and alert after three weeks.
There is a special sleep laboratory at a university in England. Scientists there study how sleep affects people. They ask volunteers to sleep in a special room and drive a car on a simulator. The volunteers get tired quickly and start to fall asleep. The scientists want to know how to help people stay awake and safe on the road.
We know that humans sleep in a daily cycle. We switch between different stages of sleep, from light to deep sleep. Our brains paralyze our bodies while we sleep to keep us safe. But we don't know exactly what sleep does for our bodies. Some scientists think it helps us repair our bodies or rest our brains, but this is not certain.
Some people sleep more than others. Women sleep for about an hour longer than men, and older people sleep less. Scientists are not sure why this is. Some people think sleep is important for traveling through time without getting hurt. Others think it's just a natural part of being human.
In the past, people didn't sleep the same way we do today. They would sleep for a few hours, wake up, and then sleep again. This was a special time for them to think and relax. But now, most people sleep for a long time at night and wake up in the morning. Some people still sleep like this today, especially in countries where it's not safe to sleep at night.
So, many people need to sleep more and sleep better.

Birds have been important to human culture for a long time. People love, fear, and respect them. But what does this say about us?

Wrens have been in British culture for a long time. In the past, people believed that the direction the wren flew in would tell them their luck. Today, people still like to keep wrens as pets or put their pictures on things. 
Birds are important to our culture because they help us understand the natural world. We have a special connection to birds because we need them to survive. This connection is important and has been passed down through generations. 
Some birds are more important than others because they are in stories and legends. The red kite, for example, used to be a common sight in London, but it disappeared. Now, people are trying to bring it back. 
Birds are important to us because they remind us of who we are. We admire their freedom and singing. Some people think these feelings are old-fashioned, but they're still important to us.

The wren in the greenhouse is a reminder of the connection between the past and the present. It's a mystery that we can't fully understand, but it's special.

Maps are used to show how things are related to each other on the Earth's surface. This is done by showing distance and direction. A long time ago, people used to measure distance by how long it took to walk or travel, but this didn't give exact distances. Direction was not as important for people who just wanted to know where to go and how far it was. Maps were not always accurate, and different maps used different ways to show things.
Over time, cartographers (people who make maps) got better at measuring distance and direction. They used new tools and ideas from other sciences, like astronomy. They also used the Earth's magnetic field to help them make more accurate maps.
As people's needs changed, cartographers had to make new kinds of maps. For example, soldiers needed maps that showed accurate terrain features, and archaeologists needed maps that showed where old things were found. Today, cartographers make maps for many different purposes, like showing where things are used or what the weather is like.
It's important to remember that maps are not always perfect and can be old-fashioned. Cartographers have to be careful when making maps and should not be copied from old maps without checking. Maps are very important because they help us understand how people lived in the past.

'Helping Badgers'
I was surprised when someone gave me a big cardboard box. Inside, I saw three small grey badger cubs. They were very small, about 8 inches long, and had soft, fluffy coats and big, milky eyes. I had never seen badger cubs before. They were brought to our farm because their mother was killed while digging a hole for a pipe. The cubs were cold and hungry, but I took care of them. I named them Primrose, Bluebell, and Willow.
At first, I fed them with a special bottle and wiped their bottoms with a warm cloth to make them feel like their mother was licking them. After a few days, they started eating solid food and drinking from a bottle. They were very happy and played with each other.
But one of the cubs, Willow, got sick and died. I was sad, but I took care of the other two. Later, a farmer found another badger cub and brought it to us. We named him Willow II. He was a bit different from the others, and it took him a while to eat and drink. But eventually, he got better.
As they grew up, the badgers started to go out at night and play in the orchard. They would chase each other and even play-fight with us. It was fun! But we also had to be careful because other badgers might come and try to hurt them.
We decided to build a special home for the badgers, called a sett. It had tunnels, a big enclosure, and a special door that opened to the outside. The badgers loved it and started to explore it at night. They would curl up in their new home and sleep.
Now, the badgers are happy and healthy. We still see them sometimes, and they come to say hello. They have their own territory now, and we are proud of what we did to help them.

In the summer, peacocks at Whipsnade Wild Animal Park show off their beautiful tails to the hens. This is a mystery that has puzzled people for a long time. How can birds have such a big, showy tail when it might not be helpful in the wild? Some scientists, like Charles Darwin, thought that birds evolved to be the way they are because of a process called natural selection. This means that the birds that are best suited to their environment are more likely to survive and have babies.
But the peacock's tail doesn't seem to be very useful. It's big and heavy, and might even get in the way. Darwin thought that the females liked the males with the showy tails because they were beautiful, but his friend Alfred Russel Wallace thought that the females might like them for another reason. He thought that the males with the showy tails might have some other good qualities that the females can see, but that we can't.
Now, scientists are trying to figure out what the hens really like about the peacocks' tails. They are studying the birds at Whipsnade and looking at how the hens choose their mates. They are also looking at whether the males with the showy tails are healthier or stronger than the others.
One scientist, William Hamilton, thinks that birds with showy feathers might be healthier because they are less likely to have diseases. But the scientists at Whipsnade haven't been able to test this idea yet.
The scientists are also looking at whether the babies of the males with the showy tails grow faster or are healthier than the babies of the males with less showy tails. If they find that the babies of the showy males are healthier, it will mean that the females are choosing the males for a good reason.
There is one more idea that might explain why peacocks have such big, showy tails. It's called "Fisher's Runaway". This idea says that if a female chooses a male with a slightly better tail than the others, his sons will inherit his tail and his daughters will like long tails too. Over time, the males with the longest tails will have more babies, and the females will like longer tails even more. This could be how the peacocks' tails got so big and showy.

**Natural Talents**
Humans and chimpanzees are very similar. We are almost the same genetically. Our bodies and brains are different, but not much. This means that what makes us special is not very big. 
We thought that humans were special because we make art. But, animals make art too! Chimpanzees use sticks as tools and sea otters use rocks to open clams. Even monkeys have a simple language.
We have few differences between humans and animals. Art is one of the main differences. But, our ancestors didn't make art for a long time. The earliest art we know of is from 35,000 years ago.
Some people say that human art is special because it's not useful, it's for pleasure, and it's learned. But, birds sing for pleasure and animals make tools. And, humans can learn to make art like animals.
There was a famous art show in London where chimpanzees made paintings. The paintings were not useful, but the chimpanzees made them for fun. Some people even bought the paintings!
This shows that human art is not very different from animal art. Both are made for pleasure and not for a specific purpose.

'Sleep is very important. We spend about a third of our lives sleeping. Scientists don't know exactly why we need so much sleep. There are three ideas about why we sleep. One idea is that our body needs sleep to stay healthy. When we sleep, our body fixes any problems that happened during the day and makes us strong again. Another idea is that sleep helps us learn new things. When we sleep, our brain helps us remember what we learned during the day. Without sleep, we might not remember. The third idea is that sleep helps us have energy for the next day. When we sleep, our body gets stronger and ready for the next day.'

'Eccentrics are people who do things that are a little different from what others do. We all have our own strange habits or things we like to do that might seem weird to others. But being eccentric is when you don't care what others think and you just do what you want.

Advertising is not working well. It's not just because of the economic crisis. Advertising started to get worse in 1989, before the crisis even started. The problem is that advertising is not keeping up with the changes in the economy. Advertisers like to think about big groups of people and big media, but now there are many more brands and media options, and target groups are smaller. Even big brands don't usually target the right people.
Think about your own shopping habits. You might buy 30-50 things at the supermarket, but most of these won't be advertised brands. You might buy a few advertised brands, but not many. You might buy a new car every three years, but not many other things. You don't buy many clothes, and most of them won't be advertised brands.
There are many more brands advertised than people buy. In fact, most people don't buy most of the brands they see advertised. This is because people only pay attention to a few ads and ignore the rest. Advertising is not very effective, but it can still work if it targets the right people. It's like trying to reach a small group of people in a big crowd. You can't know exactly who will respond to an ad, but you can try to reach more of the right people by being more specific.
Some advertisers think that if they can get 1% of the population to buy their product, they will be very successful. This is a small number of people. The best way to reach them might be to use mass media, but advertising needs to be more targeted than ever before to be effective.

**How to Be a Better Leader**

* Think of yourself as a leader and believe in yourself.
* Sometimes, you need to take charge and make decisions. Try different ways of leading and see what works best.

* Learn to delegate tasks and motivate others.
* Practice your communication skills so that others understand you.
* Don't be afraid to take risks and learn from your mistakes.

**Photographing People**
People are the most interesting subjects. When someone is in a picture, it's usually more interesting than a picture without them. But people can be hard to photograph well. We need to think about how they are standing, what they are doing, and how they are feeling.
**Taking Pictures of Groups**
When taking pictures of a group, try not to have everyone stand in a straight line. Ask them to stand at different angles and distances. You can also have some people sit or kneel down.
**Posing for Pictures**
When someone is taking a picture, they often don't act naturally. They might stiffen up and look uncomfortable. Try to make them feel relaxed by suggesting they put their hands in their pockets or fold their arms.
**Taking a Good Picture**
Don't pretend you're not taking a picture when you are. This can make people feel uncomfortable. Most people are happy to have their picture taken and might even be flattered. But they might feel self-conscious, so you might need to direct them.
**Looking at the Camera**
A good picture is when the person in the picture looks directly at the camera. Ask them to look into the lens, but not necessarily smile. This will make the picture more interesting.
**Candid Shots**
Another way to take a good picture is to have the person focus on something in the picture. This can make the picture more interesting and make it look like you are observing them without noticing.
**Expressions and Gestures**
The way someone looks and what they do with their body can tell us a lot about them. A happy child can make us smile, while a sad expression can make us feel sorry for them. Look for familiar expressions like smiling, winking, or frowning.
**Background and Environment**
When taking pictures, think about the background and what it says about the person. Try to make the background not too distracting and make sure the person is not overwhelmed by it.
**Interaction**
When taking pictures of people interacting, like talking or laughing, it can make for a good picture. Look for contact between the people, like eye contact or physical touch.
**People and Places**
When taking pictures of people in a place, like on holiday, try to show them against the background. Ask them to come close to the camera and make sure the group is in the foreground.
**To Pose or Not to Pose?**
Think about why you want to take the picture. If you want a good clear picture, ask the person to pose. But if you want a more natural picture, try to take it when they are not expecting it.

Today, most chewing gum is made from synthetic materials. This means it's not made from natural things like trees. Some people still collect chicle from the trees, but it's hard work. They have to climb the trees and carry the liquid down to a camp to make the gum.

Chocolate is a popular food all over the world. In Britain, people buy a lot of chocolate at Easter. They spend over £230 million on it! This is a big part of the chocolate industry, which is a big business.

The Aztecs used cacao beans as money and to make a special drink called xocoatl. This drink was bitter and was used for special occasions. The Spanish liked it better when they added sugar and cinnamon. Chocolate houses were popular in Europe, where people went to drink chocolate.
A long time ago, chocolate was hard and had to be melted in hot water. But then someone invented chocolate powder, and that made it easier to make chocolate. In 1847, a company in Bristol made a solid chocolate bar that you could eat. Later, milk was added to the chocolate, and that's how milk chocolate was born.
Now, there are many chocolate companies in Britain. Some of them make special chocolate bars, like Cadbury's Dairy Milk. People like to eat chocolate, and it's a big part of British culture. When she's not teaching, Rachel goes down to the ocean floor in a special vehicle. It's like a small car that can take her down 3 kilometers to the ocean floor. She studies underwater volcanoes. The space inside the vehicle is small, so she can touch the pilots who are with her.
The dive can take 16 hours. It takes 3 hours to get to the ocean floor, 10 hours to collect samples, and 3 hours to come back up. If something goes wrong, Rachel can press a button to get out quickly.
Rachel has made 6 dives. She once went on a dive with a Russian team to a place with many underwater volcanoes. They were studying a volcano to see what would happen if they made a hole 150 meters deep.
When Rachel is not at sea, she works in her office at the university. She loves teaching, but she does it so she can do her research on underwater volcanoes. She calls them "black smokers" because hot water comes out of the rock and looks like black smoke.
Rachel has been scared only once, when there was an explosion while she was diving with an American team. They were surprised to be alive after that.
Rachel loves going to the deepest part of the ocean. She feels amazing when she sees the underwater volcanoes for the first time. She studied them for 3 years for her PhD, and it was an incredible feeling to see them for real.

I was tired, dirty, and hungry after my Inter-Rail holiday. My body was tired and my mind was tired of dealing with different languages and timetables. I said, "Never again!" But the next year, I did it again. And the year after that. With an Inter-Rail ticket, I could travel anywhere in Europe for a month. I could sleep on the train and carry all my things in a backpack. This made me think differently about travel. I didn't need to worry about much. I could just go and see new places. My friends and I went to France and then kept going to other countries. We didn't plan much, we just went. We saw the view from the train station and had a good time. Travel is exciting when you see a place for the first time. It's like it didn't exist before you saw it. Seeing Europe with your own eyes is the best way to understand it. This is what makes other people's holiday photos boring. The train trip is a special experience. Europe is a big place, and Inter-Rail helps you see it.

"When you travel, it's not nice to find out that your suitcase is not on the plane. You might have to wear the same clothes for a long time until the airline finds your luggage. This can happen if you are in a different country and it's not the right weather for the clothes you have. Airlines don't always tell us how many suitcases they lose, but it's true that sometimes they make mistakes. Even good airlines can make mistakes. The problem is that it's hard to guarantee that your suitcase will be on the same plane as you, especially if you have a long trip with many stops. 
The airline has rules to help prevent this. They want you to arrive at the airport early so your suitcase can get to the plane on time. They also have rules for how long you have to wait between flights. But sometimes, there are problems like traffic jams or delays, and this can cause the airline to lose your suitcase. 
There are some airports that are very big and busy, and it's more likely to lose your suitcase there. If you have to change planes, try to fly with the same airline and get to the airport early. You can also label your suitcase inside and out with your name and address, and include the flight numbers. If your suitcase still doesn't show up, you need to tell the airline staff at the baggage area and fill out a special form before you leave the airport."

I used shorter sentences, basic vocabulary, and avoided complex concepts. I also removed some technical terms like "minimum connecting times" and "property irregularity report" and replaced them with simpler language.

Charlie James is a photographer who loves kingfishers. They are beautiful birds that live near streams and rivers and eat fish. Kingfishers are blue-green and have soft, yellow, and brown feathers. They are very fast and can be hard to see. Charlie fell in love with kingfishers when he was young. He can't explain why, but he loves them very much.
Kingfishers are special birds. In old stories, they are said to be connected to the moon and the sun. This is because their feathers shine in the light and look like the sky and the sun. Charlie likes to take pictures of kingfishers because they are so beautiful. He likes to hide behind a blanket or a tree to take pictures of them.
Charlie used to miss school to take pictures of kingfishers. He didn't do well in school, but he loved taking pictures of the birds. People noticed his pictures and he got a job working for a nature magazine. He now takes pictures of kingfishers for a living. He wants to make a special film about kingfishers that shows how beautiful they are. He thinks that pictures can speak for themselves and don't need words.
Charlie loves kingfishers very much. He has spent many years taking pictures of them and still gets excited about them. His pictures show how much he loves them, but there is more to his love than just his pictures.

A. ANNE MANSON Anne Manson is a conductor. She is 30 years old. She asked if she could help Claudio Abbado, a famous conductor, during his practice sessions in Vienna. He asked her to help him with an opera. She was nervous, but she knew how to do it. Now, she works with a big opera company in London and helps conductors in other countries.
B. ANDREW CONSTANTINE Andrew Constantine is a conductor. He is 31 years old. He won a big competition in 1991. After that, he got many chances to conduct orchestras. But he still has trouble being known for winning the competition instead of his own work. He wants to be known as a good conductor, not just a competition winner.
C. WASFI KANI Wasfi Kani is a conductor. She is the boss of a small opera company called Pimlico Opera. She loves working on operas because they take a long time to prepare. She started conducting when she was in her late 20s. She learned from a good conductor named Sian Edwards.
D. ROGER VIGNOLES Roger Vignoles is a conductor. He is 48 years old. He used to play music in an opera house. Last year, he conducted a big show from the piano. He was surprised that it was easy! He is happy to do whatever he is asked to do to learn more about conducting.
E. WAYNE MARSHALL Wayne Marshall is a conductor. He is 32 years old. He started conducting when he was young. He helped a famous conductor named Simon Rattle. He had to conduct a show in London at short notice. Some musicians were not listening to him, so he had to be firm. He knows what he wants and is not afraid to say it.

Fun Island - The Burns Family
We went to a theme park called Fun Island. We thought it might not be as good as the big theme park we visited in the US last year. But we were surprised! The park is good for young children. Our three-year-old had a great time on the Crocodile Ride and the Giant Wheel. There's a special ride for little kids, and the older kids liked the scarier rides like Splash Out.
The only thing we didn't like was that the park doesn't have a lot of decorations. But the staff were very helpful and the park was clean and well-organized.
Wonderland - The McMillan Family
We had never been to a theme park before. We thought our little boy, Oscar, might be too young, but he loved it! He liked the Mountain Train and the little buildings that were his size. The older kids liked the ferris wheel and driving toy cars. We were happy to have places to sit and rest. The park was very nice and the staff were friendly.
Adventure World - The Jeffree Family
We spent seven hours at Adventure World and still didn't see everything. The kids loved the circus show and the ride called Running River. They were a little scared on the Terror Line, but they said it was fun. There's a special area for little kids called Toy Land. The park is very well designed and even waiting in line wasn't boring. It was very clean and the staff were great.
The Great Park - The Langridge Family
We went to The Great Park and were a little disappointed that it closed early. This park is good for little kids because the rides aren't too scary. Even I, a scared person, had fun! We loved the boat ride called Exotic Travels. We waited a long time for Lightning River, but it was over before we knew it! The park is perfect for kids around our age.
Fantasy World - The Break-all Family
Fantasy World is a big park with a lot of rides. Our kids loved the roller-coaster and the ride where you hang upside-down. There are many rides for older kids, but some were too scary for our little ones. We thought the staff were a little mixed - some were nice, but others weren't as friendly. We needed a whole day to see everything.

'Women work from home in the countryside Five women talk about their businesses. A. 'My customers are my friends,' says Christine Hogan. She runs a business that helps people design things with computers. She works from her home and has four employees. She moved to the countryside because she wanted to work from home and be with her family. B. 'I like being my own boss,' says Maggy Sasanow. She designs greeting cards and sells them to museums. Tessa Strickland publishes children's books from her farmhouse. She works with authors and artists from all over the world. She likes working from home because she can choose her own hours. E. Meg Rivers makes cakes and sells them by post and in her shop. She started her business at home and now has six employees. She used to make the cakes herself, but now she runs the business side of things.'

Meet the Watkins Family
The Watkins family is very special because they all love music. The father, John, makes instruments. He even made a cello for his son Paul when Paul was a boy. Paul is a very good musician and won a big competition. He plays the cello in a big orchestra.
John and his wife Hetty wanted to buy a cello for Paul, but it was very expensive. So John decided to learn how to make one himself. He went to school at night and learned how to make instruments. He made Paul's first cello and it was very good.
Paul and his brother Huw both love music. Paul started playing the piano when he was little, but then he started playing the cello. Huw plays the piano and writes music too.
Now Paul is a famous cellist and plays in big concerts. He has a new cello that he is very happy with. His father is proud of him, but he says the new cello is very good too.
Paul's brother Huw is also a musician. He writes music and plays the piano. He is going to play his music in a big concert soon.
The Watkins family is very busy with music. They have to keep track of all their concerts and performances. But they are very happy to be doing what they love.

The National Trust helps take care of the countryside in England. I visited the Lleyn Peninsula in North Wales and met Gareth Roberts, a warden who works for the Trust. He takes care of the beautiful areas owned by the Trust.
Gareth says you need to be sensible and good with people to be a warden. You need to work with farmers, visitors, and builders. Gareth grew up on a farm and worked there until he got married. He applied for the job as a warden and got it because of his local knowledge and farming experience.
Gareth is good at his job because he still works on his parents' farm. This helps him understand the problems of farmers and can talk to them easily. He also knows how to do physical work like building fences and planting trees.
Gareth used to like picking flowers and collecting butterflies when he was a child. Now he understands how farming can affect the countryside. He says farmers and people who want to protect nature used to argue, but now they are talking and understanding each other.
Gareth's job is to make sure things get done, like planting trees and meeting with farmers. He likes seeing projects finished and talking to the public. But sometimes he gets annoyed with people who don't respect the land and the work he does.
If you like the outdoors and have common sense, you might like to work as a warden like Gareth. But it's a tough job, and it might take a long time to get a job like this.

Meet the Netball Captain
I met Kendra Slowinski, the captain of England's netball team. She's very busy these days because the World Championships are coming up. She has to train hard every day to be the best.
I asked her if she gets strange looks when she trains in public. She said she's too focused on her game to notice. She's on a strict schedule to get fit for the Championships.
This is Kendra's fourth World Championships. Many countries will be playing, and it will be a big event. She's excited because they will have home support. She wants to make sure netball is popular in England.
Their first game is against Barbados. Kendra thinks it will be a tough game. They are ranked fourth in the world, but she knows it will be hard to win.
Netball is a fast and hard game now. Players are more aggressive. Kendra says they train hard to win, but after the game, they are friendly.
The team is taking a scientific approach to fitness. Kendra thinks it's important to be a good leader and support her team. She's been planning her netball career carefully and thinks this will be her last big event.
When she leads her team in the opening ceremony, she might get a little emotional.

**Special Music Schools**
Some children are very good at music. But it's not always easy to help them grow and develop their talent. Parents might not notice their child's special ability until they get frustrated and behave badly. Regular schools are good for kids who are good at other subjects, but music schools are special for kids who are very good at music.
There are five special music schools in Britain. They help children aged 7-18 to learn music with professional musicians. These schools are small and have a good teacher-to-student ratio. Most students live at the school, which means they are with other kids who like music too.
Some people might think that these schools are not good because they are expensive (around £12,000-£17,000 per year). But the schools try to help parents who can't afford the fees. Another problem is that some parents don't want their children to live away from home at a young age.
Some people think that taking children out of school at a young age can cause stress. Children might lose their musical talent, and the pressure to be good can make them feel bad. But the music schools keep an eye on each child and help them if they need it.
Many people who went to these schools say they learned a lot and loved the music teachers. But some people think that the schools should also teach more subjects, not just music. Some children are very good at both music and other subjects, and they might do well in a regular school with a good music department or by taking music lessons on the weekends.

Artist Susan Shepherd loves painting flowers. Her garden is full of her favorite flowers, like tulips and poppies. Some plants grow wild and spread everywhere. The garden has two long paths with many colorful flowers. This is because the people who lived here before Susan were good gardeners and left many plants. Susan also inherited a gardener named Danny. He helps her with the garden.
Susan likes to paint individual flowers, not the whole garden. She takes one flower, paints it, and then brings another one to her studio. Sometimes it takes a long time to finish a painting. Spring and summer are her busiest times, when the tulips and poppies bloom. She loves watching the flowers change shape and color over time.
Susan has always liked plants. She used to collect wild flowers when she was a child. She didn't like garden flowers because they looked fake to her. Now, she has many plants from different parts of the world in her garden. She lets her garden grow wild, like a big, happy family. Right now, she is busy preparing for two exhibitions and doesn't have much time to work in the garden. But she knows it's important to get her hands dirty to stay connected to her art.

Sarah is a chalet girl. She works in a big house in the mountains in France. She cooks and cleans for the guests who come to ski. Sarah is 24 years old and comes from West Sussex. She studied French and History of Art at university.
Sarah's job is not a career, but a way to have fun for a year or two before settling down. She likes meeting new people. She wakes up at 7 am and walks to the chalet. She has breakfast, then prepares breakfast for the guests. They like porridge, eggs, cereal, fruit, and croissants.
After breakfast, Sarah cleans the rooms or makes tea for the guests. She likes to ski and goes up the mountain as much as she can. She comes back to the chalet to prepare dinner and takes a shower. She serves dinner at 8 pm and coffee at 10 pm.
Sarah likes to chat with the guests, but sometimes they want to be alone. She meets her friends at the chalet and they go out at night. They have fun, but Sarah doesn't stay out too late on Saturdays because she has to work early on Sundays. She cleans the chalet and prepares breakfast for the new guests. She takes them to the ski shop and helps them with their skis and boots. Then she has dinner and maybe chats with friends, but sometimes she just goes to bed early.

'Mandie Currie is a zookeeper. She went to a magazine office one day. She usually wears a uniform at work. At the office, she saw people in a hurry. She is used to a peaceful place at the zoo. She liked seeing how magazines work, but she likes her job at the zoo.
Alice Cutler is a fashion assistant. She went to the zoo. She wore boots and trousers, but the zoo gave her a green shirt to wear. She got dirty. She liked stroking the elephants.
Karen Hodson is a nurse. She worked on a TV show about gardening. She was excited to meet the team. She liked being outside. She was tired, but it was fun.
Charlie Dimmock is a gardener. He worked at a hospital. He made beds and gave medicine. He was surprised he didn't get tired. He liked the friendly nurses.
Lucy Harvey is an air hostess. She worked at a gym. She felt important in her uniform. She gave out magazines on the plane. She liked being back in the gym.
Sonia McDermott is a personal trainer. She worked on a plane. She was worried about exercising. She saw that trainers eat and drink well. She likes her job and won't swap it.'

Five famous people talk about their favorite train journeys.
Andrea Thompson - Newsreader
I love going to the south of France. There's a special train that goes along the coast and into Italy. It's very beautiful. You can see the sea and the mountains. It's always nice, no matter what the weather is like. You can see the homes of rich and famous people. The people on the train are happy because they like the journey.
Raj Patel - Explorer
I have taken many train journeys. But my favorite is the Nile Valley Express in Sudan. When I was a child, I missed a special train journey with my family. I was sent to live with an aunt instead. When I came to England, I saw a big train station in London for the first time. It was amazing!
Betty Cooper - Novelist
I have a special memory of the Blue Train. It took my husband and me on our honeymoon to Egypt. My husband gave me a pink dress on the train. I liked the color pink because someone told me it's good for my brain. I've worn pink ever since! The train journey was nice because we went through France and then took a boat up the Nile River.
Martin Brown - Journalist
We were working on a project and had to cross a desert in Africa. There was no road, so we took a train called the Desert Express. Arisu Mezuki - Actress
I didn't grow up near trains, but I started loving them when I was a teenager. I made a film about a train in Yorkshire, England. The train was old and had been kept nice by volunteers. Do you want to publish your story? Margaret Stubbs is here to help. Many people write to us and ask, "Where should I send my story?" First, you need to learn about the market and find the right publishers. You also need to practice your writing. To know what kind of writing publishers want, read many books and magazines. Go to your local library and bookstore. Reading will help you understand what publishers are looking for. Remember, new books and magazines come out all the time, so you need to keep learning.
If you want to write love stories, find out which magazines publish them. Get some recent copies and see what kind of stories they like. Think about who their readers are and what they want to read.
Some people send me their stories and ask if they are good enough. As a former teacher, I never discourage anyone. But usually, the work is not ready for publication. Most new writers send their work too soon. If you only write one story, it's unlikely to be published. Successful writers often have experience in writing or journalism before they become famous.
When you send your work for the first time, keep writing more stories. Each one will be better than the last. Don't give up! Join a writing group or take a creative writing course to help you improve. Remember, every successful writer has had many rejections before they succeed. Keep writing and practicing every day.

I was waiting for a train at the big station in Baltimore. There were many people there. I saw some old couples with big bags and some young students with lots of backpacks. A nice-looking man was talking to people. He asked a woman if she was going to Philadelphia. She said no, she was going to New York. Then he asked another woman if she was going to Philadelphia. When she said yes, he asked her for help.
I was curious about what was going on. The man was looking very worried. He asked another woman if she was going to Philadelphia too. She said yes and he asked her for help. I was wondering what was wrong. The man told her that his daughter was going to fly to another country and she forgot her passport. He wanted someone to bring her passport from the station in Philadelphia.
The woman asked him why he didn't go himself. The man said his wife was in a wheelchair and he couldn't leave her alone. I thought this was a strange excuse. I looked at the man and woman again. The man was holding a big envelope. It was padded and stapled shut. I thought, "Be careful, lady!"
