My son Gary is a famous chef on TV. I, John Moore, am the owner of a restaurant. I think everyone gets a chance in life. My son got his chance to cook, and I got to run a restaurant. When I saw the restaurant, it was in a bad state, but I thought it was perfect for me.
I remember when I was a child, my mother worked in a factory and I was left alone. I didn't like it. So, my wife and I made sure to have time for our family. We lived above the restaurant and had meals together. Our children, Gary and Joe, are very confident because of this.
Gary was a lively child. He loved to play and help in the restaurant. When he was a bit older, he started working for pocket money and helped in the kitchen every weekend. He was very good at cooking and could do a lot of things on his own.
Gary wasn't very good at school, but he loved cooking. By the time he was 15, he was as good as the other chefs. He even got to be in charge sometimes. He could make over 100 meals by himself.
Gary recently started playing the drums and has his own band. I told him not to chase two things at once, but to focus on what he's good at. He's very successful now, and I'm very proud of him. I always told him that if he wants something, he has to work hard for it. He took my advice and grabbed his chance.

Finding a good flat in Dublin was very hard. Jo had just moved there and didn't know anyone. She had to stay in a hostel and look for a flat. She was a little scared because she didn't know what to expect. Jo's friends from school all went to bigger towns, but she was going to Dublin on her own.
Jo's family thought it would be good if she stayed in the hostel, but she wanted to find a flat. She saw an advertisement for a flat that said "Own room, own TV, share kitchen, bathroom". It was near her work and seemed too good to be true. Jo hoped it would be nice and not too expensive.
When she got to the flat, she met two girls, Nessa and Pauline. They were nice and invited her to have a cup of tea. Pauline had bright pink hair and Nessa had a colorful shirt. Jo was surprised to meet a punk girl, but they all got along well.

'Dolphins are very popular animals. People love to watch them in the sea, on TV and in movies. But did you know that dolphins are in trouble? According to the Whale and Dolphin Conservation Society, their situation is very bad.
Dolphins are very smart and can understand human emotions. We like to imagine them swimming freely in the ocean. TV shows like Flipper and Seaquest have made dolphins popular. However, these shows don't show the real life of dolphins in the sea.
The North Sea has lost many harbour porpoises, a type of dolphin. There are 40 different kinds of dolphins in the world. Some dolphins live far out in the sea and we don't know much about them. Others, like the bottlenose dolphin, used to live near European coasts. Now, they are only found in a few places and are sick.
Dolphins have a hard time finding food because there are too many fishing nets in the sea. These nets can hurt or trap dolphins. They can also eat bad things like pesticides, which can make them sick. Even their mothers can pass these bad things to their babies through their milk.
The noise from ships, oil wells, and other things in the sea can also disturb dolphins. We don't know exactly how, but it might be very bad for them.
We should take care of dolphins and protect them. They are very special animals and we love them.'

Exercise is good for our body and mind. It helps us feel better and stay healthy. We should exercise to stay fit and strong. Exercise can help us in many ways. It makes our muscles stronger and our body look better. It also helps us sleep better and feel less tired. Exercise can even help us feel less stressed and anxious.
There are many types of exercise we can do. We can do aerobics, jogging, or lift weights. But we should start slowly and carefully. We should also listen to our body and take breaks when we need to.
Good posture is important too. It helps us look and feel better. We should stand up straight and lift our chest up. This will help us breathe better and look slimmer.
Stretching is also important. It helps us move easily and prevents injuries. We should stretch four or five times a week. We should also do a warm-up, a workout, and a cool-down.
Remember, exercise is good for us. It helps us feel better and stay healthy. We should make exercise a part of our daily routine.

AMANDA AND OWEN'S WORK
Amanda Barrett and Owen Newman are two film-makers who go on long trips to make wildlife films. They go to places like the jungle and plains in Africa. They stay away from home for months to find the perfect shot.
Amanda and Owen have a special job. They make films about animals. They have to be careful because the animals can be hard to find. Sometimes it rains a lot, and they have to be prepared. They even have special equipment to help them get out of the mud.
Amanda and Owen work together well. They make good films together. They have been working together for a long time. They know how to make each other happy. They like to make films that show the animals' true home and make people feel something.
They eat simple food and sleep in tents. They can be away from home for up to eight weeks. They like being alone in nature because it helps them get close to the animals. They can even make friends with the animals!
Amanda and Owen have been working together for a long time. They know how to make good films. They want people to feel something when they watch their films. They want to show the world the beauty of nature and the animals that live there.

Kendra Slawinski is the captain of England's netball team. She is very good at netball. She has been playing for a long time. Next month, England will play in the World Championships. Kendra trains every day. She teaches at a school and then trains in a car park. She is very focused on her training.
I asked Kendra about her training. She said she doesn't notice people looking at her because she is too busy concentrating. She is on a special schedule to get fit for the World Championships. This is her fourth World Championships.
England will play against many countries, including Barbados. Kendra thinks it will be a tough game. The World Championships are important because it's the only chance to win. Netball has become harder and faster over the years. Players are more aggressive.
Kendra is a good leader. She wants to support her team and make them feel better. She will stop playing netball after the World Championships. But she might coach young players in the future.
Kendra is very excited for the World Championships. She will be proud to lead her team in the opening ceremony. She will have her fans cheering for her.

Rachel Mills is a scientist. She studies the ocean and the things that happen in it. She teaches at the Oceanography Centre at Southampton University. When she's not teaching, she goes on special underwater adventures. She wears a special suit and gets in a small vehicle that takes her down to the ocean floor. It's like a small car, but it's for underwater exploration.
It takes her three hours to get down to the ocean floor. Then she stays there for ten hours, collecting rocks and water. After that, she comes back up to the surface. If something goes wrong, she has a special button she can press to get out quickly.
Rachel has made six underwater trips. She's been to a place called the Atlantic Ocean, where there are big underwater volcanoes. She's also worked with a team from Russia. They were studying the volcanoes and how they affect the ocean.
When Rachel is not on an adventure, she works in her office at the university. She teaches and does research. She loves her job because it lets her study the "black smokers", which are underwater volcanoes that make black smoke.
Rachel has been a little scared sometimes. Once, there was a big explosion while she was underwater, and she thought it was the end. But it wasn't, and she was relieved to be alive.
Rachel loves her job because it's like an adventure. She gets to see things that no one else has seen before. She feels happy and excited when she sees the underwater volcanoes.

First impressions are important. People make judgments about us in just a few minutes. They notice how we look, how we talk, and how we move. Mary Pearce wanted to be a teacher. She worked hard and got her degree. She went to an interview at a school, but she didn't get the job. The teacher said, "If someone doesn't take care of themselves, they won't be a good teacher."
Simon Grant, a hotel manager, says that people who take care of themselves are more likely to care about their job. But many people don't think about how they look. Janet Goodwood worked in an office for ten years, but she didn't get a promotion because she didn't dress well.
Body language is also important. A psychologist found that most of what we say comes from our face and body. When our words and body language don't match, it can be confusing. Sheila Rice got a job offer, but she was too excited and the boss offered her a lower salary.
It's also important to know what to say and how to say it. David Artesio says it's a good idea to learn about the company before the interview. You can find this information in the company's report. Marian Woodall says it's good to have a few questions ready and to speak in short sentences.

**New Lives**
Matt Froggatt used to work in the city. He sold insurance. But he didn't like it anymore. He was bored. He wanted to do something new. So, he became a sheep farmer.
Matt's friend, the head chef of a big hotel, helped him. Matt started selling his sheep meat to the hotel. Now, he also sells it to people through the mail.
Ron Ablewhite used to work in advertising. He was a manager. But he didn't like it. He liked painting more. So, he became an artist.
Ron and his wife moved to a new place in England. They didn't know anyone there. But they made new friends. Ron's friends from the old place come to visit them sometimes.
Katherine Goodison used to be a lawyer. She worked for a big company. But she didn't like it. She was stressed and worked too much. So, she started making hats. She works from her flat in London.
Katherine likes her new job. She is responsible for everything. If she does a bad job, she knows it's her fault. She likes that.
Paul Drinkwater used to work in finance. He was good at it, but he didn't like it. He wanted to do something new. So, he became a masseur. He helps people feel better.
Paul is happy now. He has control over his life. He likes his new job.

**Four Young Sports Stars Talk About Their Lives**
Darius (runner) I like sports. I played many games, but I was best at football and running. When I was 14, I tried out for a big football team, but I chose to focus on running instead. My biggest moment was when I ran for my country and got a medal. It was nice, but not many people knew about it. I train at home in the winter and then go to a special place for three weeks before the season starts. It's fun, but I have to say no to my friends when they want to go out at night. I want to be a professional runner and go to the Olympics one day.
Gabriel (surfer) I like surfing. There are not many surfers, so I see the same people everywhere. We have to be serious and wake up early to catch the best waves. I don't like giving up my sleep, but it's worth it because I won a big competition last year. I like to celebrate with my friends after a win, and sometimes we go on a nice trip. It's okay to sacrifice some things to be a good surfer.
Dieter (yacht racer) We have a lot of fun on our boat. We like to celebrate when we win, but we don't try to be famous. Sometimes the reporters ask us about where we go out and what we do, but we just want to have fun. I'm away from home for a long time, so it's nice to come back and do normal things with my friends. I'm known in the sailing world, but not many people recognize me on the street. I like getting letters from fans and always reply to them.
Tomas (tennis player) It's great to play tennis and feel like the crowd is cheering for me. Sometimes it gets crazy, but I like being recognized by fans when I'm out and about. However, it can be hard to deal with. My last girlfriend didn't like it when I got too much attention from other fans. As a tennis player, I have to travel a lot, and that's why we broke up. It's hard, but you have to make sacrifices in sports. I'm happy to focus on my game now and do other things when I retire.

Shopping with children can be very difficult. They always want to buy something new. Sometimes it's a special breakfast cereal, a Disney video, or a comic. Parents often can't afford all these things. If they say yes, they feel guilty because they think they're buying too many unhealthy things. If they say no, they feel bad because they're not letting their children make their own choices. Parents try to avoid taking their children shopping, but then they worry that they're not teaching their children how to make good choices.
Research shows that children ask for something to buy every two minutes when they're in the supermarket. Many companies spend a lot of money advertising to children, especially on TV. Children often don't understand why their parents can't buy everything they want. They think the advertisements are very convincing.
Some parents are worried about what their children eat and want to teach them about healthy food. But children only hear the advertisements and don't get the whole story. Parents feel bad because they're competing with the advertisements and can't always say yes to their children's requests.
Some parents feel stressed when they're shopping with their children because they have to decide what to buy and what not to buy. One mother said she talks to her son about food and labels, and he's learned to be critical of advertisements. Now they don't argue much when they're shopping.
Parents also admit that they're not always consistent in what they say yes or no to their children. One father said they don't buy his son sweets because they're bad for him, but they buy other treats for themselves. He feels bad because he's not being fair.
Supermarkets could make shopping easier for parents by moving sweets to a different part of the store or providing a play area for children. This might make parents happy and want to shop there more often.

The Merrion Hotel is a new, five-star hotel in Dublin. It's made from four old houses that were converted into a hotel. The hotel has the latest technology to make it easy for staff and guests. The General Manager, Peter MacCann, wants his staff to know the guests' names and likes. The hotel's computer system helps them remember things like what music a guest likes. This system cost a lot of money, but it will save money in the long run.
Guests can change the room temperature themselves, but they can also ask the staff to adjust it. The hotel has special technology to make sure the room is just right. The hotel also has special rooms for business people. Each room has three phones, a fax machine, and a video-conferencing facility.
The hotel has a swimming pool, gym, and many other facilities. The food is very good, and the chef has a special restaurant. He can design his own kitchen and cook delicious food. The hotel has a beautiful garden and many other nice things. With its technology and helpful staff, the Merrion Hotel is likely to be very successful.

**Six Women Who Have a Lot of Energy**
Emma Marsden asked six women to share their secrets for having lots of energy. Here's what they said:
A. Jeanette Kupfermann: "I get energy from doing something new and exciting. I like to learn and try new things. Dancing is also very fun and gives me energy."
B. Linda Kelsey: "I love my job and that gives me energy. I need to sleep a lot to feel good. Exercise also helps me feel more energetic."
C. Annie Nightingale: "I get energy from being happy and positive. I love my job and like to have fun. I also enjoy taking photos and writing songs."
D. Floella Benjamin: "I get energy from doing things I enjoy. I love working with kids and being with my family. Smiling at people also gives me energy."
E. Deborah Moggach: "I love making gardens and writing. When I'm writing, I feel happy because I know people will read my work. I also like exploring in nature."
F. Katherine Monblot: "I get energy from doing things I like and respect. I like to take risks and try new things. Doing things I don't like makes me tired."

Ice Skating
Ice skating is very old. People used animal bones to make skates a long time ago. Later, people used iron to make skates. In some countries, skating was very important for rich people. 
A long time ago, skating was only for special people. But a girl named Sonja Henie changed that. She skated at the Olympics when she was 11 years old. She showed everyone that skating could be fun and exciting. 
Now, people skate for fun and exercise. It's good for your body and mind. To start skating, you need to stand with your feet close together and your knees bent. You need to bend your legs and keep your body straight. 
It's important to relax while you skate. If you're tense, you might fall. But don't worry, falling is okay. Just get up and try again. 
There are different ways to skate, like figure skating and speed skating. But first, you need to learn how to skate properly. You can take lessons at an ice rink near you. 
Skating is good for your body. It helps you balance and move. It's also good for your heart and lungs. You can even do other exercises like swimming or jogging to stay healthy.

'Trills and tears
Julia Gregson talked to three young stars and their mothers about their lives. 
A. Annika Reeder is 15 and won a gold medal for gymnastics. She wants to be a physiotherapist and compete in the Olympics. 'I work very hard. I don't have time to watch TV or play with friends. I just do gym and school. Sometimes I get very tired, but my coach gives me a day off sometimes.'
B. Annika's mother 'Annika was very good at gymnastics from a young age. She loves it and it has helped her become more confident. She used to be shy and hide behind me, but now she's made friends all over the world.'
C. Sarah Stokes is 10 and loves show-jumping. She has won a big competition in Britain. 'I love show-jumping. It's exciting and fun. My parents help me and we go to shows for one to five days. I don't get tired of it.'
D. Sarah's mother 'Sarah loves horses. She started riding when she was one year old. She's very good and knows what she's doing. It's great to see her succeed at something she loves.'
E. Jane McShane is 10 and is the best chess player in Britain for her age. 'Chess is fun at tournaments. I know everyone and it's nice. I don't think about winning or losing. I just play.'
F. Jane's mother 'Jane started playing chess when she was five. She loved it and got better and better. I'm happy when she wins, but if she wants to stop playing, that's okay too.'

Do you know how tall you are? Chris Greener, a man from Britain, is the tallest person in his country. He is 228 cm tall! Many years ago, people were also very tall. In fact, our ancestors were even taller than us. This is because they ate food from nature, like fruits, vegetables, and animals. They didn't eat just one type of food like we do today.
Many years ago, people started to grow crops instead of hunting and gathering. This was a big change. Now, most people eat just three types of food: wheat, rice, and maize. This has made us shorter and less healthy. 
In the past, when people ate a variety of foods, they were healthier and taller. But now, we are getting taller again because we have better food. In some countries, like the US, Japan, and Holland, people are getting taller. 
But there is a problem. We can't keep getting taller forever. We need to stop growing at some point. Scientists think we might stop growing at around 193 cm. However, they also think that as a species, we might get smaller because of the warm weather. 
Let me know if you'd like me to make any further adjustments!

Watching TV shows being made is interesting. People come from all walks of life to be in the audience. You might think they're all silly people who want to be on TV. But it's not like that. People come for different reasons. Some want to be on TV, some are curious to see how it's made, and some just got a free ticket from a friend.
I went to a TV show and talked to some people in the audience. They told me they liked being there because it was exciting and fun. They got to see things that they wouldn't see if they were just watching at home. One person said it was more exciting than watching at home because they got to see their favorite comedian live.
I didn't think it was exciting, though. I was sitting far away and could only see the back of someone's head. But for most people, it was just a fun night out. They didn't care that it wasn't the best way to watch TV. They just enjoyed being there.

I like places with people, not just nature. When I travel, I like to visit old villages and towns. When I was a child, I went to school in England and loved cycling to the village of Lastingham. I liked exploring the hills and valleys and old villages. I would write about my adventures in my diary.
I like taking a special train from Hythe to Dungeness. It's not very expensive and I like looking at the countryside. The train goes through fields and alongside a canal. Sometimes we pass through people's backyards and I get to see what they're doing.
I like the coast of Hartland Peninsula. The beaches are hard to get to, so there are not many people. It's a good place to relax and enjoy the sea. There are nice walks and you can go inland to see beautiful valleys with oak trees and flowers.
My favorite place in England is the Trough of Bowland. It's a big open area with no people and no buildings. I like the feeling of space and freedom. I go there every year and it's special because I can be with my family.
I bought a house in England called Glenthorne. It's a peaceful place where I can relax and feel connected to my roots. I grew up in Sri Lanka but went to school in England when I was 12. I loved cycling around the moors and villages. Glenthorne is a special place for me, it's like a dream come true.

We like animals. My daughter found a special snake in our garden. She wanted to keep it. I said yes, but only for one night. We have a special tank for snakes. But then something unexpected happened.
My cat, Domino, caught a mouse. The mouse was scared and ran around the room. My kids were screaming. I tried to help, but I tripped and fell. Then I saw the snake was loose! It was escaping. I was scared and crouched down.
The snake was big and long. It was hissing and moving around. My kids were jumping over it. I tried to catch Domino, the cat, and got the mouse out of his mouth. The snake was very fast and hard to catch.
I finally got the snake and put it outside in our garden. It was very big and slithered away. My kids and I watched it go. One of my kids said, "That was a big snake!"

"Write to me! In today's world, we use phones, computers, and emails a lot. But I think writing letters is still special. When I get a letter, I feel happy and excited. I like seeing who it's from and reading what they have written.
I started writing letters when I was little. My mom would always ask me to write thank-you notes for presents. Even if they were short and messy, it was okay as long as they were letters.
When I went away to school, I would write to my mom every week. My dad would sometimes write too, and it was always fun to read his letters. They usually told me about what was happening at home and with our friends.
I also wrote to my boyfriends when they were away. It helped us stay in touch, and I could say things more easily in writing than when we talked.
I like getting letters with birthday cards or Christmas cards. It's nice to get news from people, and it's even better if it's from someone far away. I have penfriends in Sri Lanka, Australia, and France. We write to each other regularly.
I think it's important to keep writing letters. It's a special way to connect with people and stay in touch. My kids are learning to write letters too, just like I did when I was little. I want them to keep this tradition going."

'Tourists hurt ancient rock pictures in the French Alps. Many pictures are being destroyed. The pictures are 4,000 years old. They show cows, fields, and gods. People are drawing on the pictures and taking pieces home. They are also rubbing the pictures to make them look better. This is making the pictures disappear.
Experts are worried. They think that if people keep doing this, the pictures will be gone in 50 years. Some experts want to close the area to visitors. Others think we should let people visit, but with guides. They think we need to find a way to make it safe and clean for everyone.
The problem is that it is hard to stop people from damaging the pictures. We need to find a way to make it safe and clean for everyone. We must take care of the pictures so they can be seen by future generations.'

Shopping with kids can be very difficult. Some mothers say it's like a big fight. They want everything they see, like a new toy or a sweet. But the mother can't afford it and feels guilty if she says yes. If she says no, she feels bad too. She wants to teach her children to make their own choices, but it's hard.
Research shows that kids ask for something every two minutes when they're shopping with their parents. Many parents spend a lot of money on TV ads to make their products look good. Kids don't understand why their parents say no to things they want. They only see the fun ads and not the bad things about the products.
Some parents are worried about what their kids eat and what's healthy. But kids don't always understand why they can't have something. They just see the ads and want it. Parents feel like they're competing with the ads and can't always say no.
Some parents are stressed about deciding what to buy and what not to buy. They feel like they're not being fair to their kids. One mother says she talks to her son about ads and labels, so he knows they're not always true. Now they don't argue as much when they're shopping.
Some parents are not consistent and can be mean to their kids. They say no to their kids, but then buy things they like themselves. It's hard to be fair.
Supermarkets could make it easier for parents by moving sweets away from the checkout or providing a play area. This way, parents could shop without their kids asking for things all the time.

"Climbing is a popular sport. People used to climb mountains. Now, you can climb anywhere, inside or outside. A big crowd is watching. High up on the wall, a French climber named Francois is hanging upside down. He's competing in a big climbing competition at a big indoor arena in Birmingham.
The indoor arena is famous for a TV show called Gladiators. But both the TV show and the climbing competition have something in common - The Wall. This is because of a new technology that makes it possible to build climbing walls anywhere.
Before, climbers used to climb on cliffs. But this wasn't always possible. In the winter, they would get cold or go for a walk instead. Some climbers used to climb on snow and ice in Scotland. But as climbing became more popular, climbers needed to stay fit all year round. So, they started using brick edges and stone buildings to practice.
Many sports centers built walls for climbing. These walls had special edges to hold onto. A teacher named Don Robinson built the first climbing wall in a school corridor. He had the idea to put real rocks in a block of concrete. Many walls were built like this in the 1970s. But they had some problems. They could only be built straight up and down, not like the cliffs outside. Climbers got bored with the same old holds.
In 1985, a Frenchman named Francois developed a special material that could be molded into shapes like the rocks on the cliffs. These shapes could be put on any wall and taken off when climbers got bored. French companies also made panels that could be attached to a steel frame. This made it possible to build walls with overhangs and angles. Climbers could use different holds every time they climbed."

Do you want to be an actor? If you say this, people might tell you it's a risky job. And it is! There are many people who want to be actors, but not enough jobs for all of them. When you choose to be an actor, some friends might think you're crazy. But it's a personal choice, and only you can decide. There's no easy way to become an actor. You can't just take a test and get the job. It's about being lucky and having talent. 
But there are always new opportunities and chances to be discovered. People are always looking for new faces and new talent. And sometimes, being an actor can be exciting and fun. 
So, why do people want to be actors? It's hard to explain. But for many, it's about that special moment when they're on stage and the audience is watching. This is what makes acting special, no matter where it happens. 
Actors often don't know why they're good at their job. They just know certain things about themselves and how to do things. But they never take anything for granted. They know they're only as good as their next job, and they might not be famous forever. 
Actors don't like to talk about their chances of getting a part. They try to protect themselves from the stress of trying out for a job and getting rejected. Nobody likes being rejected. And remember, this can happen from the very beginning of their career. 
It's up to you to care about your job and be good at it. If you don't care, nobody else will either.

We have some special cookbooks that we think you will like. One famous cook is Delia Smith. She writes recipes from all around the world and makes them easy to make. Her book is very popular and has lots of good recipes.
Another famous cook is Raymond Blanc. He used to be an amateur chef and now he owns a famous restaurant in Britain. He wants to teach us how to cook by showing us how ingredients work together. He has over 80 recipes in his book that are easy to follow.
Le Cordon Bleu is a famous cooking school in France. They have been teaching people how to cook for 100 years. They have a new book with 100 classic French recipes that are still tasty today. The recipes are easy to follow and have pictures to help you.
Nigel Slater is a food writer who thinks you can make good food quickly. He has written a book with over 200 recipes that can be made in 30 minutes. He likes food from all around the world and has written about it in his book. His recipes are delicious and easy to make.

Chris Greener is the tallest man in Britain. He is 228 cm tall. When he was 14, he wanted to join the navy. His teacher asked him what he wanted to be. Chris said he wanted to be the flagpole on a ship. The teacher was right, because Chris was already very tall.
People in Europe are getting taller. Every year, more people are born who are very tall. But this doesn't mean we are making a new super race. We are going back to how people were a long time ago. Our ancestors used to eat many different foods, like fruits and berries. They got their food from nature. But then, people started to grow crops and this changed everything.
Eating the same foods every day made people unhealthy and short. In one place, people were healthy and strong when they ate wild foods, but when they started eating corn, they became sick and weak. This was a big problem.
Now, some countries are eating better and people are getting taller again. In the US, the average person is 179 cm tall. In Holland, it's 180 cm, and in Japan, it's 177 cm. This is good news, but it also means that we need to make bigger beds and clothes.
But scientists think that we might not get any taller. We might even get smaller because of the heat. A long time ago, people were bigger and round because it was cold. Now that it's warmer, we are getting smaller. We might get even smaller as the planet gets warmer.

'I changed my job. I used to work in the city, but it was no fun anymore. I was an insurance agent, but I didn't like it. Then I lost my job and got some money to start a new business. I wanted to be a farmer. I grew up on a farm and always loved animals. I now have a sheep farm and supply meat to a big hotel. I work hard, but it's different from before.
I know someone who used to work in advertising. He was a manager, but he wanted to be an artist. He was good at painting and loved it. He took a chance and became an artist. He was scared, but it worked out.
Another person used to be a lawyer. She liked her job, but it was too much work. She started making hats and now runs her own business. She likes being her own boss and having control.
I know someone who used to work in finance. He was good at his job, but it wasn't fun. He wanted to help people feel better, so he became a masseur. He took courses and now works at a special place. He's happy and has control of his life.'

Two brothers, Dave and Norm Lagasse, play a fun game from their childhood. They are in their 40s and live in Santa Fe, New Mexico. They sit at a wooden table with round pieces. They play a game called pichenotte, which their grandfather brought from Canada. He made the first board from old crates. The family played it every weekend and holiday. When they moved to New Mexico, they still played. People who visited were surprised because it was a new game in the area.
One day, Dave made a new board. A relative and a friend wanted one. They thought it was a great game. They took it to a sports bar and people started to play. The brothers liked how popular it was. They wanted to know more about the game. They found out it came from India and was played in Canada and the UK.
Pichenotte is a game of skill. Players use a special board and flick pieces with their fingers. The goal is to get the pieces into holes. The game is easy to learn and fun to play. The brothers made more boards and took them to markets. People liked the game and bought the boards. They even made a trophy for the best player.
Now, the brothers make pichenotte boards in their garage. They sell them on their website. They are happy to play the game and make money. They hope to have a nice life with their game.

Welcome to the Model Village!
A long time ago, this place was just a empty and dirty land. But one man, Colin Sims, and his wife worked very hard to make it beautiful. They moved a lot of soil and clay to make the land look like it does now. It was a big job, and they needed to use special machines and a lot of hard work.
Colin and his wife planted many trees and flowers. They chose plants that can grow well in this place, near the sea. Some plants even came from far away, like Canada and New Zealand!
The models in the village were made by Colin himself. He made over 100 models over nine years. He used different materials like stone, concrete, and wood to make them strong. He had to learn how to make them strong and weather-resistant.
The models are very detailed and look very real. Colin was very patient and learned new ways to make them. The village is very popular and people come from all around to see it.
You can walk around the village and see many things, like a castle, a church, a zoo, and a mini golf course. Please stay on the paths and don't touch the models. You can take pictures from the paths, but not from close up. Dogs are welcome on a short lead.
If you press the buttons in front of some of the models, they will work. We would like to hear your comments and ideas. We are always making new models and want to know what you think. We hope you have a nice time and will come back again soon!

Some newspapers in the UK print pictures that hurt people's feelings and break the rules. Celebrities usually don't want to be photographed when they're private. But sometimes, pictures of famous people are published without their permission. This can cause a lot of trouble. The Press Complaints Commission (PCC) is supposed to help with these problems, but it doesn't often do anything.
A famous actress was photographed on her hotel balcony. She was upset because she felt it was private. The PCC didn't investigate. The PCC should look into another problem too - a story about a pop star's personal life. The pop star didn't complain, but the PCC should have taken action.
The PCC could take pictures of famous people, but it would be very hard to decide what to do. It would also cause trouble for the newspapers and photographers. Celebrities might not want to complain because it would be embarrassing. They might also be worried that the PCC would find another secret story about them.
A comedian and his wife were photographed on their honeymoon. He didn't complain because he was worried that the newspaper would make fun of him again. People are scared to complain because they think the newspapers will get them again.
It's hard to find a solution to this problem.

When you finish college, many people look for a second job. This text is not about people who look for a temporary job while they are still looking for a permanent one. It's not about people who leave a job after just a few weeks because it's not good. This text is about people who want to take a big step in their career. They have some experience, skills, and know what they want to do.
What kind of job should you look for? It depends on what you want to do in the future. Do you want to work in a specific area or move to a bigger job with more responsibility? You should think carefully about your second job. You should stay in it for two to three years. This job will help you get your next job.
When you apply for your next job, they will look at your second job very closely. It should show that you have a plan for your career. It should also help you grow and give you more responsibility.
If you love to travel, now is the time to do it. You can work temporarily when you get back and then get your second job. Employers will be happy to see that you have traveled and won't want to leave again.
Juliette worked for three solicitors after college. It was a good first job because the people were nice and helped her learn. But there was no chance to move up. She left and traveled for a year. Now she works for a big company as a Personal Assistant. She says her job has grown and she has become more able. Her boss helps her learn and gives her special projects to do.

Some people are very confident, but they didn't always feel that way. They learned to be confident. I talked to five people and asked them how they did it.
A Jenny I was shy when I was young. But I helped at my daughter's school and did well. Someone suggested I take a course. I was nervous at first, but I became more outgoing.
B Michaela I had to take care of my family's business when my father got sick. I was very scared, but I learned to believe in myself. When things are hard, I don't worry if I don't finish everything. I tell myself I have nothing to lose.
C Lisa People think I'm confident, but I'm actually very nervous. I had to learn to look confident because it's important in my job. I interview people and I see that everyone gets nervous. The best advice I got was from my mother: "Who's looking at you? Everyone is too busy thinking about themselves."
D Barbara I like my job, so I feel confident. If you make mistakes, you can learn from them and try again. I work hard and people like me. I don't worry if not everyone likes me. You should like yourself, not try to be someone else.
E Kim I used to be too scared to speak up in meetings. But I started speaking up and now I'm more confident. When I first spoke in public, I was very nervous. I would tell myself, "Don't be silly. Other people do this all the time." It's okay to be a little scared, but you can do it.
The secret to confidence is to believe in yourself and tell yourself you can do it.

I went to Malaysia to see a kite-flying festival. I met a man named Adnan who gave me a special kite. He said, "Keep it, it's a tradition. If the string breaks, the finder gets to keep it." He showed me many more kites at his feet. We sat under a tree and watched the festival. There were many people holding kites and waiting for a whistle to blow. When the whistle blew, the kites went up in the air like rockets. I saw many men and boys flying kites. Adnan said, "Making kites is hard, but flying them is easy." He invited me to his house to show me how to make kites. I went to his house and had tea and snacks. He told me to come back the next day to help him fix his kite, but I didn't have time. Instead, I drove to a different part of the state. I took a wrong turn and ended up at a river. I took a boat to the other side and saw a sign that said "Jelawang Jungle 3 km." I walked up the path and met a man who gave me tea. He lived in a tent and had a few huts. I stayed there for the night. It was dark and noisy, but I was okay. In the morning, I saw a beautiful view of the mountains. It rained in the afternoon. I got wet and slid down the hill. I was worried about my car, but it was okay. When I got back to the city, everyone was friendly and asked me questions. They asked where I was from and how old I was. I remember Malaysia for its kind people and the kite festival.

What kind of shopper are you? Everyone likes to shop, but people like to shop in different ways. Do you know what kind of shopper you are?
Abby Edwards asked some friends about their shopping habits.
A. Melanie, a dancer, is an addict. She likes to spend money on clothes and shoes. She and her boyfriend like to go shopping together.
B. Brenda, an office manager, doesn't like to shop. She only buys what she needs and doesn't like to spend a lot of money.
C. Juliet, a personnel manager, only shops for essentials. She doesn't like to waste time shopping.
D. Anita, a TV producer, likes to shop sometimes. She knows what she wants and gets in and out of the shops quickly.
E. Lizzie, a secretary, doesn't like shopping at all. She only buys clothes when she really needs them.
F. Lisa, an actress, likes to shop with her friends. She buys things that catch her eye.
G. Suki, an art gallery assistant, is a careful shopper. She likes to look around and think before buying something.
H. Ann-Marie, a nursery worker, loves shopping, but only on certain days. She likes to look for bargains and takes her time.
I. Linda, a restaurant manager, doesn't like shopping. She only goes shopping when she really needs something.
This simplified text keeps the main ideas and quotes from the original text, but uses simpler vocabulary and sentence structures to make it easier for an A1 learner to understand.

The quiz sheets are free and are available from March 25 to April 9. Normal gallery hours are from 9:30 am to 5:30 pm.
New Picture

The painting is in Room 25.
Special Exhibition

Lectures

What is money? Money is like a special ticket that you can use to buy things. It comes in different names, like pounds, dollars, or francs. You can use money to buy things like books, candy, or movie tickets. But the money itself is just a piece of paper.
A long time ago, people didn't have money like we do now. They didn't have banks or stores. Instead, they traded things with each other. For example, a farmer might give some corn to a beekeeper in exchange for honey. This was a special deal between two people.
Later, people created their own special money, so they could trade more easily. Different places started using their own money, and eventually, countries started using their own money too. That's why we use different currencies today.

'Grass is a very good plant. There are many types of grass - over 9,000! You can find them everywhere in the world. Grass grows in very cold places, like the North Pole, and in hot places, like the desert. Grass is important for animals. They eat it, live on it, and use it for shelter. Grass is very strong and can grow back quickly if it gets hurt. It grows new leaves from the ground, not from the top of the plant. This means that many animals can live together in the same place. When they eat all the grass, there is always more to eat because the grass grows again.'

Kal Kaur Rai is a young woman who loves fashion. She just won an award for being a young achiever. Kal has always drawn and designed clothes. 'The Ghan Train is a special train that goes from Darwin to Adelaide in Australia. It crosses the country from the warm north to the cold south. The train is famous, but it's also known for being late. A long time ago, people wanted to build a train line from Adelaide to Darwin, but it was hard because of floods. Finally, a new line was built. The train is not very fast and doesn't stop much. Most people who ride the train are on holiday. The train was originally built to carry goods, not people. It's a special train because it's the first one to go from north to south across the country.
I rode the Ghan Train and saw many interesting things. We stopped at Katherine and some people got off to take a boat trip. I stayed on the train and went to Alice Springs with a small group. We walked around Uluru (Ayers Rock) and watched the sunset. From Alice Springs, some people got off the train and others continued on to Adelaide. The view from the train wasn't very exciting after Alice Springs, but at dawn on the third day, we saw the foothills of the Southern Ocean. My journey was over, and I saw many amazing things in Australia.'

'Ben Nevis is a big mountain in Scotland. Many people climb it every year. It's a difficult climb because it's very cold and snowy. Keith Hewitt climbed Ben Nevis for the first time in winter. He went up the north face of the mountain to a place called Tower Ridge. It's very high - 600 metres up! They planned to stay in a special place on the mountain for three days. They took tents, sleeping bags, and special shoes with spikes for walking on the snow.
Even though some of the group were very experienced, they took many safety things like lights and extra clothes. The weather was good, but they were still a bit nervous. The climb was hard, and Keith had to rest often. The others waited for him, but then they went on again. Keith promised to train more before climbing again.
After 200 metres, they reached the start of Tower Ridge. It's very narrow and the mountain drops down very far on both sides. They had to be careful and take their time. After seven hours, they reached the top. On a clear day, you can see the sea and the island of Skye far away. But it was misty when Keith climbed, so he couldn't see much.
Going down the mountain can be just as hard as going up. You need to know how to read a map to find the right way. Keith was happy they took turns doing this job. He was relieved to be back in his tent and could say he enjoyed the climb. He was proud of making it to the top!'

Our new school is very exciting! We moved into a new building last week. It's made of wood, like our old school, but it's special because it's good for the environment. When you come into the school, you'll notice it's warm inside. That's because we make the heat with our bodies, the teachers' bodies, and the computers. The building is special because it keeps the heat and sound inside. If we sing in class, it feels like we're in a big concert hall!

Tanya is famous in some countries, so people listen to her when she talks about protecting the environment. She wants to keep breaking her own records and will continue free-diving for many years.

The colour and taste of honey depend on the flowers they visit. There are many types of honey. Light honey is not as sweet as dark honey. "The Eden Project is a very popular place to visit in England. It's in the south-west part of the country. When you first see it, it looks like a movie scene. There are big, round houses called 'biospheres' on the old industrial site. Each biosphere is like a different part of the world, showing how important plants are for us. Did you know that many things we use every day come from plants? Like wood, rubber, fruit, and more! There are over 135,000 different types of plants here. It's warm inside the biospheres, no matter what the weather is like outside. In one part, it's always a little wet because of a big waterfall. There are also parts that are like the Mediterranean, California, and South Africa. They're building a new part that will be like the desert soon."

"Some people don't like the new book, New Writing 3. I don't understand why. It's a big book with 500 pages of new writing. It's a good deal for only PS6.99! The book has stories and parts of novels. "Best Age to Start Learning Violin
Margaret Porter, a violin teacher, says the best age to start learning the violin is between three and six years old. This is when children are curious about the world. Margaret likes to teach children who are three and four years old. She has also taught some very keen five-year-olds.
Margaret's students have group lessons. There are about 12 students in each group, and they meet once every two weeks. Each student also has a one-on-one lesson with Margaret once a week. The parents come to the lessons too. It's important for parents to help their children learn.
At first, students learn to play the violin by listening. They don't try to read music until they have been playing for a few years. There is a big difference between how they play and how they read music. Margaret says her way of teaching is not for students who want to become very good violinists. She suggests that these students should find a different teacher."

'Moonshine has released a new CD. It's their third one. The new CD is different from their last one. A new person, Tom Wilcott, is playing the bass guitar now. Another new person, Tom Simpson, is playing the drums. The first two songs on the CD are fast and fun to dance to. They are different from the slow songs Moonshine usually plays. Some fans might be surprised by these new songs. They are very good and could be big hits. The singer, Rob Letchford, sings very well and hits all the right notes. He had to record the songs before he got sick, so the band had to cancel their next tour. But don't worry, the concerts will be rescheduled when Rob feels better. Moonshine can play many different kinds of music, from slow to fast. I think they put their best songs at the beginning of the CD, and the last few songs are not as good. But overall, "Here Again" is a great CD and will be very popular.'

'San Francisco is a city in California, near the ocean. A long time ago, a Spanish explorer named Gaspar de Portola found the area in 1769. San Francisco Bay is a beautiful and safe place for boats. Many people came to San Francisco in 1849 to search for gold. But the people who got rich were not the ones who found gold. They were the ones who owned banks and law firms. They built big houses on a hill called Nob Hill. Today, many tourists visit San Francisco to see famous places like Chinatown and the Golden Gate Bridge. Some people also take a short boat trip to Alcatraz Island to see the old prison.'

'SAMUEL PEPYS Samuel Pepys wrote a famous diary. He wrote about his daily life in England from 1660 to 1669. He wrote about big news, like sickness, ships coming up the river, and a big fire in London. He also wrote about himself, like when he fell asleep in church or looked at pretty girls. He wrote about his family, like when he argued with his wife and how they made up. He was worried about her being sick. He liked books, music, plays, card games, and parties with good food. Pepys was a busy man who did many important jobs. He was a politician and helped the Royal Society. He is also famous for helping the British Navy.'

'Long ago, people didn't care about shoes being comfortable or looking good. They wore animal skins on their feet during cold weather. Today, we still use leather, but we also use other materials like silk, plastic, or cotton. 
A long time ago, people used to wear the same kind of shoe on both feet. Now, we wear different shoes on each foot. 
Before, all shoes were made by hand. But now, most shoes are made in big factories using machines. This makes it possible to make many shoes at a lower price, so more people can buy them.'

"When I got hurt, I couldn't run anymore. I wanted to help more women start running. I was angry because some people in charge of running events didn't want to help women run. They said there weren't enough women, but they didn't make it easy for them to join. So, I started a running group for women in my area. I put up posters and 40 women joined. They wanted to lose weight, but they didn't know much about running. They thought it would be hard and painful. But now they can run for 30 minutes! THE IDITAROD TRAIL
A long time ago, people went to Alaska to find gold. They built new towns, and one town was called Iditarod. It was a very big town for a while. In the summer, people could bring things to the town by boat. But in the winter, the water was frozen, and it was hard to get to the town. So, people built a special path for dogs to pull sleds. They would bring food, clothes, and mail to the people who lived in the town.
The path was called the Iditarod Trail. It took a long time for the dogs to get from one end to the other. They stopped at special places called roadhouses to rest and eat. People used this path every winter until airplanes came. But in 1925, something special happened. A bad sickness called diphtheria came to the town of Nome. The medicine to make people better was far away, and the only way to get it was by dog sled. Twenty teams of dogs worked together to bring the medicine to Nome. They followed the Iditarod Trail and did it in just six days. A dog named Balto was very brave and helped save the team. Now, every year, people have a big dog sled race from Anchorage to Nome, following the same path. It's called the Iditarod and is known as 'The Last Great Race on Earth'.

'Sweden's Ice Hotel is very special. It's in a place called Jukkasjarvi in Sweden. People go there from all over to stay in rooms made of ice! You can even get married in one of these rooms. The hotel has an ice bar, but don't put hot drinks on the ice, it will melt! The bedrooms are a bit cold, but you get special sleeping bags to keep warm. If you need, you can also borrow warm clothes. The hotel is rebuilt every winter because it melts in the summer. It takes a lot of ice and snow to build the hotel - 10,000 tonnes of ice and 30,000 tonnes of snow!'

'Maria Mutola played football with boys in Mozambique. She was the only girl on the team. They won a game, but some of the other team didn't like it because she was a girl. A man named Jose saw the story in the newspaper and met Maria. He thought she was fast and wanted to help her with another sport called athletics. Maria didn't know what athletics was, but Jose bought her special shoes and took her to practice. It was hard work and her legs hurt. But Jose talked to her parents and they agreed to let him help her. Maria went to the United States to train. She was sad to leave her family, but she was happy to be there. The trainers were very good and she learned a lot. Today, Maria still runs and lives with her mom in South Africa.'

'THE ROCKIES The Rocky Mountains are very long. They start in the northwest and go all the way to the middle of North America. The Rockies are not as big as the Alps, but they are still very beautiful. There are many roads to drive through the Rockies, but the best way to see them is by train. You can start in Vancouver, a big city in Canada. Vancouver is special because you can ski just 15 minutes from the city center. There are not as many trains as before, but you can still take a fun trip. You can sleep on the train, and see very pretty views at night.'

'Zoos have been around for over 3,000 years. A long time ago, the rulers of China had a big zoo called the Gardens of Intelligence. In the past, animals in zoos were taught to do tricks for visitors. Now, people think it's better to let animals be themselves. Most cities have a zoo or a wildlife park. Some people like zoos because they can learn about animals and see them up close. They also think that some zoos are dirty and give animals bad food.'

'I play the trumpet in my school jazz band. We had a competition with other schools and we won! Everyone wore different costumes, like our black school uniforms or bright T-shirts. We were all good at playing because we practice a lot. Some people even made up new songs on stage. It was fun to watch, but even better when we played!
Not everyone can be in our band, but those who want to play come to practice before school and after school. We listen to jazz and learn about it. My teacher thinks it's because pop music is not exciting enough for people who love music. I like jazz because it's new and old at the same time. We can make our own music, but we also feel like we're part of something special. We're lucky to have good teachers and parents who help us with our music.'

"Marrakesh, a city in Morocco, gets rain sometimes between November and March. But when it rains, the streets can get very wet because the pipes can't handle it. Lately, it hasn't rained much, so when it does, people are happy. Marrakesh has parks and gardens because of special underground channels that bring water from the mountains all year round. These channels are very old, from the 11th century! Places that get their water this way are called oases. If you travel south from Marrakesh, you'll get to Skoura. There, people use the water channels to grow food in small squares. The Atlas mountains, with snow in the winter, look very pretty."

Gareth Ellis is a 13-year-old boy. His dad, Alan, is an engineer, and his mum, Kath, is a teacher. Gareth's older brothers work in a bank and with computers. But Gareth always wanted to be a clown. Three years ago, his family joined a circus. They thought it was funny when people found out. Gareth loved the circus when he was little, and he wanted to be a clown when he was just three years old.
Gareth's dad lost his job, so they decided to work at the circus full-time. Gareth's mum and dad both got jobs at the circus, and Gareth started learning to be a clown. He calls himself Bippo. They travel with the circus in the summer and go back home in the winter. Gareth's brothers are old enough to take care of the house while they're away.
It wasn't easy for Kath and Alan to leave their home and start a new life. They had to think about a lot of things and organize everything. They only had a small car and a tiny caravan to sleep in. Gareth missed taking long, hot baths.
People ask Gareth about school, but he still learns with a teacher wherever they go. He uses the same books as his friends back home and has a computer. He's never fallen behind his classmates.
Kath is happy that they made this decision. She says it's working, and they're enjoying it. Gareth wants to be the main clown in a circus one day. Maybe he'll even have his own circus, called Bippo's circus.

Winter Driving
Winter driving is tricky because it's hard to know what will happen and accidents can happen easily. Fog can suddenly appear on a hill, and ice can be hidden under the snow. Cars can slide across the road. To drive safely on icy roads, follow these rules:
Rule Number One: Drive slowly and smoothly. Don't make sudden movements. Imagine you're carrying a cup of hot coffee - drive carefully so you don't spill it.
Rule Number Two: Watch out for what might happen. Look far ahead, especially on icy roads. Test how long it takes to stop by gently braking. Remember, you might be going faster than you think. When the road is wet, snowy, or icy, leave more space between you and the car in front of you.
Stay in control of your car and you'll be safe.

Craigie Aitchison was a Scottish painter. He went to London to study law, but he liked art better, so he went to art school instead. He didn't like the traditional drawing classes, but he kept painting. When he was older, the Italian government gave him money to study art. He liked the colors and light in Italy and wanted to put this in his paintings. He paints colors one on top of the other, from light to dark. He doesn't know what the painting will look like when he finishes. He says, "It's a secret, because I don't know myself." He doesn't make drawings before he starts painting. He changes his paintings many times before they are finished. He likes painting people who don't want to see the painting while he is working. This way, he can focus on his art. Craigie Aitchison doesn't follow the traditional way of painting. He paints the way he wants. Many young British painters like his work.

'Atlantic College I visited Atlantic College in Wales. It's a special school that helps students learn and do new things outside of class. They study in the morning and then do something useful in the afternoon, like helping on a farm or taking care of people who need help.

'I'm 32 and I just finished my first year at university. I have to go to classes and read books fast, and write long papers. I didn't go to school for 14 years. I was a secretary, but I was bored because I didn't have to think much. I was unhappy and jealous of the students at the local university who looked happy and free. I wanted to learn more. I like studying more than going out on weekends. I also like having long holidays and discounts for movies and theater. Sometimes I worry about what I'll do after university, but I think it was a good choice.'

Henry Ford was born in Michigan in 1863. He didn't like farming. When he was 15, he started working as a mechanic. He built his first car in 1893. He drove it a lot and then sold it. He built two more cars and in 1903, he started a company called Ford Motor Company. He made cars that were strong and light, so they were cheap for people to buy. In 1908, he made the first Ford Model T. It cost $825. People liked it and he sold 100 cars every day! By 1927, his company was worth a lot of money. Henry Ford's cars were simple and cheap, but that meant people didn't have many choices. He said, "You can have any color you like, as long as it's black."

'Canada Geese are big birds with blue and white feathers. In the autumn, they fly south to a warmer place. It's too cold in Canada for them to stay there. One spring, a man named Bill found 16 baby Canada Geese on his farm. They didn't have their parents. Bill thought, 'These little birds won't know what to do when autumn comes.' Bill had a small plane and decided to teach the birds to follow him. During the summer, he flew his plane and the geese followed him. When autumn came, Bill flew to a place in the United States, 600 miles away from his home. The geese followed him all the way. Bill left the geese there and went back home. This spring, Bill was waiting for the birds to come back. But they didn't come. So Bill flew to the United States to find them. He looked for them for two weeks, but couldn't find them. When he got back home, Bill found the geese waiting for him. They had found their way home by themselves!'

'HOW DO I LIVE A HEALTHY LIFE?
I sleep a lot. When I go home, I sleep for 10 hours. But after a concert, it's hard for me to sleep because my head is full of music.
I like sports. Before I had an accident, I went to the gym for 2.5 hours, 5 days a week. Now, I do 150 sit-ups every day.
I don't drink alcohol or smoke. I try to eat well. I also drink a lot of water because it's good for me. I should drink 8 glasses a day, but I don't always remember.
I think it's important to rest sometimes. I love my job, but I also like to listen to music or watch TV in my free time.
The doctor told me to eat better, so I eat more carrots and spinach every day. But I still like to eat burgers sometimes!'

'Bollywood' is the name of the movie industry in Mumbai, India. They make a lot of movies every year. Since they made their first movie in 1913, they have made over 29,000 movies. This is more than any other country, so it's the biggest movie industry in the world. Many Indians like watching movies more than any other free time activity. Ten million Indians go to the cinema every day. Bollywood movies tell love stories and have singing and dancing in them. People in other countries also like Indian movies. Last year, Bollywood made a lot of money by selling their movies to other countries. Indian actors make more movies every year than American actors, but they don't get paid as much. That's why Bollywood movies are cheap to make. Hollywood movies are always very expensive, at least $5 million. Most Bollywood actors are young and work hard, but they only work for a few years. One famous actor, Amitabh Bachchan, is special. He has been in over 140 movies and has been acting for almost 40 years.'

'I'm Bill Bryson. I was born in the United States, but I wrote many books about England. I lived in England with my wife and four children for 20 years. Now, we live in the United States. My children are learning about life here. I think they will be happy because they lived in two countries. I like England and want to go back, but my daughter will start college here soon, so I'll wait four years. I just visited England for six weeks to work on a radio show about the English language and talk about my new book. Many writers don't like traveling to sell their books. I don't mind. I like visiting new places and meeting people. It's different from my life in the United States when I write. In England, people drove me around in big cars and I stayed in nice hotels. It was good because I didn't have to pay bills. Everyone was kind and it was fun.'

'Schnauzer Dogs There are three kinds of Schnauzer dogs. Two small kinds came to England a long time ago. The big Schnauzer came later. The big Schnauzer is very tall, 65 to 67.5 cm. All Schnauzers have long hair. They need to be cut often. Most small Schnauzers are grey, but the big Schnauzer is usually black. Schnauzers come from Germany. Farmers use them to help with their sheep. The police also use Schnauzers because they are very smart. Schnauzers make good family dogs. They are friendly and nice with little children.'

'Mary is a student from England. She had a special holiday this summer. She went to the Ruwenzori Mountains in Africa with 15 friends. They went to help build a road in the forest between two towns.

Howard Bonnier Bray is a small village near London. A man named Howard Bonnier opened a restaurant called The Palace there. He is very good at writing about food and has written about many good restaurants in France. People in France know him well. He is only 29 years old.

'There are five kinds of rhinos. Two kinds, the Black and White Rhino, live in Africa. The others live in Asia. Rhinos are big and strong. Their skin is hard and they don't have much hair. They have four short legs. Each foot has three toes. Rhinos walk slowly, but they can run fast. They are quiet and calm animals. They only eat grass and plants. A baby rhino is born after being inside its mother for 15 months. When it is born, it weighs 40 kilos. An adult rhino can live for 50 years and weigh over 200 kilos.'

'A LONG TIME AGO, LONDON DIDN'T HAVE POLICE. Some old men helped keep the streets safe at night, but they didn't get paid much. London was a big city, but it was dirty and many people were poor. There were many thieves, so people stayed at home. In 1750, a man named Henry Fielding paid some people to stop thieves. They were like police and were called the Bow Street Runners. Later, there were more and more thieves, so in 1829, the London Police Force was started with 3000 officers. Most of them walked, but a few rode horses. Until 1920, all the police were men. Now, London police are paid well and some police officers still ride horses, and they get even more money than the others.'

'Visit Edinburgh! Every year, many people go to Edinburgh, the capital of Scotland, to see the Edinburgh Festival. For three weeks in August and September, the city is full of actors and artists from all over the world. They come to Edinburgh for the biggest arts festival in Britain. During this time, the streets are full of music and dancing from morning to night. You can even see artists painting pictures on the streets. One of the best parts of the Festival is the 'Fringe', where students do comedy shows in small rooms and cafes. 'Fishing on the Ice
If you drive north from Toronto for three hours, you will reach Lake Nipissing. In winter, the lake freezes and many people come to fish. They build small houses on the ice and paint them bright colours. Then they sit inside to catch fish that swim under the ice.
Bob Marvisch has been coming here for twenty-five years. 'You need warm clothes,' he says. 'Wear two pairs of socks, gloves, and a warm coat. It's easy to catch fish. First, you break the ice and make a small hole. Then you put a fishing line with bread on it through the hole. When a fish eats the bread, you pull the line up. The fish are small, about ten to twenty centimetres long. Some people like to eat them, but I like to have a snack instead. Today, I caught twenty-five fish! It's a fun activity and you can meet nice people here!'

'Madame Tussaud's Museum in London is very popular with tourists. You can see wax figures of famous people there. Madame Tussaud was born in France a long time ago. There, she made wax figures of famous people who had died, including a queen. Later, Madame Tussaud married a man named Francois and came to London with her wax figures. She opened a museum here and people can still see her figures today.'

Only rich people could buy one. The old bicycles looked different from the ones we have now. When bicycles became cheaper, many people bought one. People started using bicycles to go to work and have fun. Now, most people use cars more often. Cars are faster and you don't get wet in the rain. But some people still like to ride a bike to work. 'I went to Thailand with my family last summer. We went to a park near our hotel. We saw beautiful flowers, but we really wanted to see the elephant show. We went to a big square with seats. We gave the elephants bananas for lunch. Twenty years ago, elephants worked in the forest. Now, they live in special places where people can visit them.'

THE OSTRICH
The ostrich is the biggest bird in the world. It can be very heavy, over 90 kilos. Most ostriches live in Africa, but there are not many left. Like all birds, ostriches have wings. But they can't fly. They use their wings to help them turn when they run. Ostriches are very fast. They can run 65 to 90 kilometers per hour. It's hard for other animals to catch them. Baby ostriches are the same size as chickens. They take 3 years to grow up. Ostriches eat plants and can go without water for a long time.

'Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest mountain in Africa. Many people have climbed it. Some are very young, some are very old. There are different ways to get to the top. One way is the Marangu path. 'Otters Otters are special animals that live near rivers. They build their homes using small pieces of wood. Otters like to come out at night. They are very good swimmers and can swim fast. Otters have thick brown fur that keeps them warm in the water. They can even close their ears and nose when they swim. This means they can stay underwater for a little while. A long time ago, there were not many otters in Great Britain. The rivers were dirty and many fish and insects died. Otters didn't have enough food. But now, the rivers are clean again and there is plenty of food for the otters.'

'POSTCARDS People like to send postcards to their friends and family. They have pictures of nice places like the beach, mountains, or a castle. You can write a message on the back. Many people send postcards when they go on holiday. Postcards are cheap and the pictures are nice. Someone sent the first postcard a long time ago. It was a picture of a town by the sea. Later, postcards showed what was happening in the news. People liked them because they didn't have pictures in their newspapers then.'

'Dinosaurs Nobody has seen a dinosaur. A long time ago, 60 million years ago, the last dinosaur died. We don't know why they all died. Birds are like dinosaurs. Dinosaurs were not all the same. There were over 5,000 kinds. Some were small, but some were very big. The biggest were the biggest animals that ever lived on land. The Brontosaurus was 20 meters long and ate plants. The Tyrannosaurus Rex was not as big, but it was strong. It had sharp teeth for eating meat and could run fast because it had long legs.'

'Bears Bears can be dangerous. They are very strong and can hurt people. Bears are good at climbing and running. They can't see well, so they find food by smelling. There are seven kinds of bears. The biggest is the polar bear. It is very tall. There are two kinds of black bears. One lives in North America and the other in Asia. But not all black bears are black. They can be brown or reddish brown. Everyone likes the black and white panda bear from China. But there are not many pandas left because it's hard to find food.'

'CROCODILES We can find crocodiles in warm places like Africa, South America, and Australia. They like to stay in slow-moving water, but they can swim fast and even walk on land. You often see crocodiles with their friends in groups. They eat whatever they catch, like fish, birds, and small animals. Sometimes they eat big animals or even people. There are many kinds of crocodiles. They all have sharp teeth. When they lose their teeth, they grow new ones. Crocodiles are usually about 3.5 meters long. Some are even bigger! They can live a very long time. The oldest one in a zoo was 66 years old.'

'FLYING MACHINES A long time ago, two brothers in France built the first balloon that could take people up in the air. Many years later, in the United States, two other brothers built the first plane with an engine and flew in it. Then, the post office started sending letters by air. Planes changed a lot after that. In the 1950s, planes got faster because they had special engines. A special plane called Concorde was built in the UK and France. It is the fastest plane in the world and can fly very fast. Now, many people travel by plane, and it's hard to imagine a world without them.'
